Long Melford Library

Manager: Elise Hardy

United Reformed Church Room, Hall Street, Long Melford
CO10 9JT

Tel: 01787 377525
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Friends of Long Melford Library

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Parking: free parking available on street
  • Customer toilet

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: available
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges
